content: Media URL could not be loaded

comment.text: The MediaError translation key displays an error message when a media URL cannot be loaded. It is used in a media viewer component to inform users of loading failures.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Имаше проблем при зареждането на URL адреса на мултимедията' is a bit verbose and less direct than 'Media URL could not be loaded'. While technically correct, it doesn't convey the same level of clarity and succinctness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Появи се проблем с URL адреса на мултимедията

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly formal and literal. While grammatically correct, it doesn't sound natural in Greek. A more user-friendly translation would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Δεν μπόρεσε να φορτωθεί η διεύθυνση URL πολυμέσων

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Մեդիա URL-ը չհաջողվեց բեռնել' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Media URL could not be loaded' in a natural Armenian way. It's a bit clunky.

The translation 'Impossibile caricare l'URL del contenuto multimediale' is too literal. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'Impossibile caricare il media' or 'Errore nel caricamento del media'. The original English 'Media URL could not be loaded' implies a general media loading failure, not just a URL issue.

The translation 'Neizdevās ielādēt multivides vietrādi URL' is not an accurate translation of 'Media URL could not be loaded'. 'Vietrādi' is incorrect in this context. 'Vietrādi' means 'cross-reference' or 'reference', not URL. A more accurate translation would use a term related to 'address' or 'link'.
While not strictly incorrect, the phrase 'Neizdevās ielādēt' could be improved for a more natural flow. A more common phrasing is 'Nevarēja ielādēt'.

The translation 'URL media nu s-a putut încărca' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Nu s-a putut încărca URL-ul media' or 'Adresa media nu a putut fi încărcată'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nu s-a putut încărca URL-ul media

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "මාධ්‍ය ඒ.ස.නි. පූරණයට නොහැකි විය" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Media URL could not be loaded". 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (ASCII) is unnecessary and confusing. 'පූරණයට' (for filling/loading) is technically correct, but less natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මාධ්‍ය ලිංකනයට ඇණවුම් කිරීමට නොහැකි විය (Media link couldn't be accessed/loaded)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'මාධ්‍ය' and 'ලිංකනය' are correct, the phrasing is unnecessarily technical and doesn't flow naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මාධ්‍ය පටව පූරණය කිරීමට නොහැකි විය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Не вдалося завантажити URL-адресу медіа' is a literal translation but sounds awkward in Ukrainian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the media itself, not just its URL.
While 'URL-адресу' is technically correct, 'URL' is often used directly in Ukrainian in technical contexts and simplifies the sentence.

The translation "Không thể tải URL phương tiện" is technically correct but could be more natural and user-friendly. While 'phương tiện' translates to 'media,' it's a slightly formal word in this context. A more conversational alternative might be preferred.
